rooms.description: Open plan living area with Mediterranean-style decor and Vastu-aligned placement in the northeast section for positive energy.
Formal dining space adjoining the kitchen, with north-facing windows per Vastu principles.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen equipped with wheelchair accessibility features and ample counter space. Located in the southeast to promote activity flow.
Spacious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, positioned in the south-west quadrant for restful energy as per Vastu guidelines.
Secondary bedroom with natural light exposure from east windows, adhering to Vastu's harmonious principles.
Third bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort with north-west orientation for balanced energy flow.
Dedicated servants' quarters integrated into the design, placed on the periphery of the farmhouse with easy access and wheelchair-friendly layout.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned north for auspicious entry as per Vastu. Features a ramp and wide threshold for wheelchair accessibility.
Large windows for natural lighting, placed along the east side to enhance brightness and energy flow.
Service door leading directly to the garden and external area, accessible by wheelchair.
Secondary exit door facing west on the plot boundary, ensuring proper ventilation and emergency access.
